topic.title: Candidate Patient Registry Type - conformance rules

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.94"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10728)/@code="67553-8" EMS candidate patient registry (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10729)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10730), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet RegistryType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.74 STATIC (CONF:10731)
NEMSIS Trace: EOther.02
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10728)/@code="67553-8" EMS candidate patient registry (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10729)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10730), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet RegistryType 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.74 STATIC (CONF:10731)
NEMSIS Trace: EOther.02
